utils

Class ButtonGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Node>
          • utils.NodeGroup<Button>
            • utils.ButtonGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<Node>, Collection<Node>, List<Node>, RandomAccess

    public class ButtonGroup
extends NodeGroup<Button>
    Creates an ArrayList-based group of Buttons.
    Author:
    racello
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • addButton

        public ButtonGroup addButton(String id,
                             String text,
                             EventHandler<ActionEvent> handler)
        Adds a Button with a custom EventHandler.
        Parameters:
        id - the string identifying the Button
        text - the string representing the Button's display text
        handler - the ActionEvent handler for this Button
        Returns:
        this ButtonGroup instance with the new Button added

      • addButton

        public ButtonGroup addButton(String id,
                             String text)
        Adds a Button using the ActionEvent handler specified for this ButtonGroup instance.
        Parameters:
        id - the string identifying the Button
        text - the string representing the Button's display text
        Returns:
        this ButtonGroup instance with the new Button added

      • setHandler

        public ButtonGroup setHandler(EventHandler<ActionEvent> handler)
        Set the ActionEvent handler belonging to this ButtonGroup instance (functions as the default handler for new buttons). If a default handler is desired, this method should be called at the beginning of the chain.
        Parameters:
        handler - the ActionEvent handler for this ButtonGroup instance
        Returns:
        this ButtonGroup instance with the updated handler

      • getIdList

        public List<String> getIdList()
        Get a List containing the ids of the Button objects contained in this ButtonGroup.
        Returns:
        the string list of Button ids
